title: 正版用户 forge版本打不开
author: wwpzxp
txt_content:
昨天下载了个浏览器MOD的懒人包，然后我直接把正版的C盘的存在的游戏文件夹删了，替换成他的minecraft.文件夹，然后我一启动游戏就出现，Java(TM) Platform SE binary已停止工作这是怎么回事，以下代码[14:50:10 INFO]: Client> 2013-11-03 14:50:10 [警告] [Web Displays] Mod Web Displays is missing a pack.mcmeta file, things may not work well
[14:50:10 INFO]: Client> 2013-11-03 14:50:10 [信息] [Minecraft-Client] Reloading ResourceManager: Default, FMLFileResourcePack:Not Enough Items, FMLFileResourcePack:Web Displays
[14:50:10 INFO]: Client> 2013-11-03 14:50:10 [信息] [STDOUT] 
[14:50:10 INFO]: Client> 2013-11-03 14:50:10 [信息] [STDOUT] SoundSystem shutting down...
[14:50:11 INFO]: Client> 2013-11-03 14:50:11 [信息] [STDOUT]     Author: Paul Lamb, www.paulscode.com
[14:50:11 INFO]: Client> 2013-11-03 14:50:11 [信息] [STDOUT] 
[14:50:11 INFO]: Client> 2013-11-03 14:50:11 [信息] [STDOUT] 
[14:50:11 INFO]: Client> 2013-11-03 14:50:11 [信息] [STDOUT] Starting up SoundSystem...
[14:50:11 INFO]: Client> 2013-11-03 14:50:11 [信息] [ForgeModLoader] FML has found a non-mod file CodeChickenCore 0.9.0.5.jar in your mods directory. It will now be injected into your classpath. This could severe stability issues, it should be removed if possible.
[14:50:11 INFO]: Client> 2013-11-03 14:50:11 [信息] [ForgeModLoader] FML has found a non-mod file commoninputfix.1.6.2.0.jar in your mods directory. It will now be injected into your classpath. This could severe stability issues, it should be removed if possible.
[14:50:11 INFO]: Client> 2013-11-03 14:50:11 [信息] [ForgeModLoader] FML has found a non-mod file NotEnoughItems 1.6.1.3.jar in your mods directory. It will now be injected into your classpath. This could severe stability issues, it should be removed if possible.
[14:50:11 INFO]: Client> 2013-11-03 14:50:11 [信息] [ForgeModLoader] FML has found a non-mod file CodeChickenLib-universal-1.6.2-1.0.0.24.jar in your mods directory. It will now be injected into your classpath. This could severe stability issues, it should be removed if possible.
[14:50:11 INFO]: Client> 2013-11-03 14:50:11 [信息] [ForgeModLoader] Registering Forge Packet Handler

replies.author: xukarhei
replies.txt_content:
webdisplay缺少文件了
重装这个mod吧
求采纳!~

replies.author: wwpzxp
replies.txt_content:
xukarhei 发表于 2013-11-3 15:02 
webdisplay缺少文件了
重装这个mod吧
求采纳!~
为什么我用盗版能打开。
